meanings.definition: A person or team that has reached the semifinal round of a competition.
meanings.sent1: The semifinalists were excited to have made it to the next round.
meanings.sent2: The semifinalists played their best to reach this stage of the competition.
meanings.sent3: The semifinalists celebrated their success with a big party.
meanings.sent4: The semifinalists were like shining stars in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The semifinalists' determination was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals or teams that have advanced to the semifinal round of a tournament.
meanings.sent1: All eyes were on the semifinalists as they prepared for the next match.
meanings.sent2: The semifinalists were strong contenders in the tournament.
meanings.sent3: The semifinalists joked about their lucky charms bringing them this far.
meanings.sent4: The semifinalists stood out like beacons of success in the tournament.
meanings.sent5: The semifinalists' teamwork was key to their progress.
